# Source 

These notes summarise the Academy for PhD Training in Statistics (APTS)
    module "Statistical Machine Learning" taught by Louis J.M. Aslett
    from 13th to 17th September 2021.

Course notes are referenced below with a website given, [@aslett2021].

Module aims to give a broad overview of statistical machine learning methods to 
    PhD candidates who already have a good understanding and intuition of
    statistics.
    
The chapters in this document reflect the chapters in the source material
    for easier further reading and comparing.
